solution_line_template: Cindy gave her {num_friends} friends {marbles_per_friend} marbles each, a total of {num_friends}*{marbles_per_friend} = <<{marbles_per_friend}*{num_friends}={marbles_given_away}>>{marbles_given_away} marbles
Four times the number of marbles she has remaining is {marbles_remaining}*{multiplier} = <<{marbles_remaining}*{multiplier}={final_result}>>{final_result}
